subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Fred Funk won the Champions Tour’s season-opening MasterCard Championship on Sunday in Kaupulehu-Kona, Hawaii, birdieing the final two holes for a seven-under 65 and a two-stroke victory over Allen Doyle.The 51-year-old Funk was coming off a 10th-place tie last week in the PGA Tour’s Sony Open. Doyle, who blew a four-stroke lead, shot a 68.
